title: Sri Jayananda Prabhu Goes Back to Godhead | HH Stoka Krishna Swami
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: Jayananda Prabhu was always engaged after coming in touch with Prabhupada in devotional service as Prabhupada instructed him.
segments.summary: The speaker describes how Jayananda Prabhu, knowing he was dying of cancer, focused on Krishna Consciousness and devotional service to prepare for death, as instructed by Prabhupada, ultimately going back to Godhead.
segments.transcript: Jayananda Prabhu was always engaged, after coming in touch with Prabhupada, in devotional service as Prabhupada instructed him. Towards the end of his life, when he realized he had cancer, he knew that very soon he was going to die, quit his body. He did not want to take treatment in the hospital, but he came back to the temple and he requested devotees to help him to always remember Krishna. He diverted his mind away from the pain and the complications of the disease towards hearing and chanting about Krishna, about the holy name of Krishna, all of the pastimes of Krishna, and engaging with devotees in the temple. In this way, he was preparing to quit the body. Death actually came, and he was completely absorbed in Krishna Consciousness. Prabhupada confirmed because he was engaged always in Krishna Consciousness, so he went...
